org.aion.api

Interface IAdmin


  • public interface IAdmin
    This interface dedicate to contact with Aion kernel for certain purpose.
    Author:
    Jay Tseng

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockDetailsByNumber

        ApiMsg getBlockDetailsByNumber(java.lang.String blkNum)
        Get detailed block information include all transactions and the transaction logs by given the string of block numbers.*
        Parameters:
        blkNum - the class String represent by the list of blocks separated by comma [,] &/or dash [-]. eg. 600-650 eg. 700,701,750 eg. 700,800-900 eg. 500-200
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class BlockDetails wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 1000 block details fit the query interval if the user query the block over the 1000 blocks

      • getBlockDetailsByNumber

        ApiMsg getBlockDetailsByNumber(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> blkNum)
        Get detailed block information include all transactions and the transaction logs by given the List of block numbers.
        Parameters:
        blkNum - the list of block numbers, it can be discontinuous.
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class BlockDetails wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 1000 block details fit the query interval if the user query the block over the 1000 blocks

      • getBlockDetailsByLatest

        ApiMsg getBlockDetailsByLatest(java.lang.Long count)
        Get detailed block information, for all blocks in range (latest - n, latest]
        Parameters:
        count - number of blocks from latest for which to retrieve block details
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class BlockDetails wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 1000 block details fit the query interval if the user query the block over the 1000 blocks

      • getBlocksByLatest

        ApiMsg getBlocksByLatest(java.lang.Long count)
        Get block information, for all blocks in range (latest - n, latest]
        Parameters:
        count - number of blocks from latest for which to retrieve block details
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class Block wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 1000 block details fit the query interval if the user query the block over the 1000 blocks

      • getAccountDetailsByAddressList

        ApiMsg getAccountDetailsByAddressList(java.lang.String addresses)
        Get detailed account information, given a string of addresses
        Parameters:
        addresses - the class String represent by the list of accounts separated by comma [,]. eg. 0xA,0xB,0xC ...
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class AccountDetails wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 1000 account details that fit the query interval.

      • getAccountDetailsByAddressList

        ApiMsg getAccountDetailsByAddressList(java.util.List<org.aion.base.type.Address> addresses)
        Get detailed account information, given a string of addresses.
        Parameters:
        addresses - list of addresses
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class Address wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 1000 account details that fit the query interval.
